parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
Language type for request and response messages. Values:

- **zh** (default): Chinese.
- **en**: English.

parameters.name: RoleFor
parameters.description: User ID for the administrator to switch to another member's perspective.

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
View type. Values:

- 0: Current Alibaba Cloud account view.
- 1: View for all accounts under the enterprise.

parameters.name: Taskflow
parameters.description: XML configuration information for playbook orchestration.
